name: Minecraft Connect
description: Bidirectional real-time integration between TikTok Live events and Minecraft (Java Edition)
author: pupcidslittletiktokhelper Team

features.name: WebSocket Bridge Server
features.description: Local WebSocket server for communication with Minecraft mod

features.name: TikTok Event Mapping
features.description: Map TikTok events (gifts, follows, likes) to Minecraft actions

features.name: Minecraft Action System
features.description: Execute various actions in Minecraft: spawn entities, give items, change weather, etc.

features.name: Dynamic Parameter Substitution
features.description: Use TikTok data in Minecraft actions (username, gift count, etc.)

features.name: Safety Limits
features.description: Rate limiting and cooldowns to prevent spam

features.name: Dashboard UI
features.description: Configuration interface for managing action mappings

features.name: Stream Overlay
features.description: Visual feedback for Minecraft actions on stream

descriptions.en: Bidirectional real-time integration between TikTok Live events and Minecraft (Java Edition). WebSocket bridge server enables custom events, commands, and in-game interactions.
descriptions.de: Bidirektionale Echtzeit-Integration zwischen TikTok-Live-Events und Minecraft (Java Edition). WebSocket-Bridge-Server ermöglicht benutzerdefinierte Events, Befehle und In-Game-Interaktionen.
descriptions.es: Integración bidireccional en tiempo real entre eventos en vivo de TikTok y Minecraft (Java Edition). El servidor puente WebSocket permite eventos personalizados, comandos e interacciones en el juego.
descriptions.fr: Intégration bidirectionnelle en temps réel entre événements TikTok Live et Minecraft (Java Edition). Le serveur pont WebSocket permet événements personnalisés, commandes et interactions en jeu.
